entry.title: Huer Salt Water Taffy - 150g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Huer
Type: Candy
Price: 4.99

Classically Sweet Salt Water Taffy

Colourful, smooth and oh so creamy! Try Huer's Salt Water Taffy, a retro sweet that comes in an array of delicious classic flavours. These candies are sure to make your mouth water! 

Fun Fact: Everyone always wonders why Salt Water Taffy is called what it is! Well, the history of the name was loosely based between a little joke & reality. This special treat was originally produced in Atlantic City, New Jersey in 1883 by a candy-store owner, named David Bradley. One day, his shop became flooded with sea water, and when people came by for their taffy fix, he sarcastically told them it was "salt water taffy" - and the name stuck... forever! Now, tons of seaside candy shops capitalize from the name "salt water taffy". But truly, they are not salty at all - as a matter of fact, they are sweet just like regular taffy!

Huer's Salt Water Taffy is a fantastic retro addition to any retro or colourful themed candy buffet or arrangement for showers, weddings, parties, or corporate events.

With a range of assorted flavours, you'll never get bored of this bag of tasty salt water taffy! There will always be a favourite flavour for every palette.

150 g
